IngestMetadataFile.description: Information about a particular ingest perfomred to produce a KGX graph, describing source data, ingest process, and details of the resulting KGX graph.

edge_predicates.description: List of all Biolink predicates used in the graph.

file_created_by.description: The agent(s) (person if hand-authored, software tool if created programmatically) that created this ingest metadata file.

file_creation_date.description: When this metadata file was created.

file_name.description: An informative, human-readable name for this metadata file/object. e.g. "2025-08-18 Translator CTD Ingest Metadata"

ingest_code_url.description: URL of the specific official release or tagged branch of the ingest code executed to perform the ingest.

node_categories.description: List of all Biolink categories used for nodes in the graph.

node_normalizer.description: Name/identifier of the algorithm/tool used to perform node normalization on the ingested data. e.g. "Babel"

node_normalizer_url.description: URL(s) pointing to source code and/or information about the node normaliztion tool used. e.g.  "https://github.com/TranslatorSRI/NodeNormalization"

node_normalizer_version.description: Version of the node normalization tool/algorithm.

orphan_node_count.description: Count of nodes in the graph that do not participate in an edge.

source_access_date.description: Date the source data was accessed/downloaded into the system that performed the ingest.

source_access_urls.description: URLs where source data was accessed / downloaded / queried to be brought into the system performing the ingest.

source_data_version.description: Version of the source data ingested (using source's own conventions).

source_file_names.description: File names from which content used to produce the output KGX graph was retrieved.

source_infores_id.description: Infores identifier of the ingested source.

target_creation_date.description: Date the target data set/graph was created.

target_data_model_version.description: Version of the target data model used to structure the KGX graph data. e.g. "4.2.6-rc5"

target_format.description: Format in which the KGX graph is serialized (e.g., "KGX-jsonlines").

target_model.description: Name/identifier of the data model used to structure the KGX graph data.

target_model_url.description: A URL providing information about the data model used to structure the KGX graph data. e.g. "https://biolink.github.io/biolink-model/"

target_name.description: A unique human readable name of the target data set/graph produced by this ingest. e.g. "2025-08-18 Translator CTD Ingest Graph"

total_edge_count.description: Count of total edges in the graph.

total_node_count.description: Count of total nodes in the graph.

IngestMetadataFile.title: IngestMetadataFile
